content: Software comes from heaven when you have good hardware.
author: Ken Olsen, founder of Digital Equipment Corporation

content: Strange women lying in ponds distributing swords is no basis for a system of government. Supreme executive power derives from a mandate from the masses, not from some farcical aquatic ceremony.
author: Dennis the Peasant, Monty Python and the Holy Grail

content: Invention, my dear friends, is 93% perspiration, 6% electricity, 4% evaporation, and 2% butterscotch ripple.
author: Willy Wonka

content: If we knew what it was we were doing, it would not be called research, would it?
author: Albert Einstein

content: What... is the air-speed velocity of an unladen swallow?
author: Bridgekeeper, Monty Python and the Holy Grail

content: Michael, I did nothing. I did absolutely nothing, and it was everything that I thought it could be.
author: Peter Gibbons, Office Space

content: After two weeks of working on a project, you know whether it will work or not.
author: Bill Budge, designer of Raster Blaster
